div.p: What is the best book you've ever read and why?

The best book i've ever read is " Human " by Yann Arthus Bertrand. This book speak about nature, history, the earth, the oceans, the animals and for sur the environement. Why this is the best book i've ever read ? Because i think, this is very important for our population to make some efforts for the planet. We must be careful with the ecology, we must be prudent with a lot differnts things like the cars, the protection of animals. The polution is a problem for the health. A lot of people dead every year because of that. The demography is important in 2016 and it will be dangerous if the demography continues like that. We 've got a lot of solutions to make the world better, for example, reduce the density in a lot of great town as Paris, London.
